==Story==
{{VO/Story
|character           = Rosaria
|language            = ja
|name                = ロサリア

|vo_01_01_title      = 初めまして…
|vo_01_01_subtitle   = Hello
|vo_01_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Hello.ogg
|vo_01_01_tx         = そこの信徒、何か困っていることがあれば私を頼るといいわ。祈祷がしたいだけなら、他のシスターに…<br />うん？信徒じゃない？
|vo_01_01_rm         = Soko no shinto, nanika komatteiru koto ga areba watashi wo tayoru to ii wa. Kitou ga shitai dake nara, hoka no Shisutaa ni...<br />Un? Shinto ja nai?
|vo_01_01_tl         = You there, disciple, if you've got a problem on your hands, you can let me help. If you just want to pray, go find another Sister...<br />Hmm? You're not a disciple?

|vo_02_01_title      = 世間話・退屈
|vo_02_01_subtitle   = Chat: Boredom
|vo_02_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Chat - Boredom.ogg
|vo_02_01_tx         = まだ行かないの？
|vo_02_01_rm         = Mada ikanai no?
|vo_02_01_tl         = Are we still not going?
|vo_02_02_title      = 世間話・残業
|vo_02_02_subtitle   = Chat: Overtime
|vo_02_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Chat - Overtime.ogg
|vo_02_02_tx         = なんでもいいわ、残業以外ならね。
|vo_02_02_rm         = Nan demo ii wa, zangyou igai nara ne.
|vo_02_02_tl         = Anything is fine, except overtime.
|vo_02_03_title      = 世間話・モンドの生活
|vo_02_03_subtitle   = Chat: Life in Mondstadt
|vo_02_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Chat - Life in Mondstadt.ogg
|vo_02_03_tx         = しっかり働いて、まじめに生きる。モンドってそういうところでしょ？
|vo_02_03_rm         = Shikkari hataraite, majime ni ikiru. Mondo tte sou iu tokoro desho?
|vo_02_03_tl         = Work hard, and live seriously. Isn't that the way in Mondstadt?

|vo_03_01_title      = 雨の日…
|vo_03_01_subtitle   = When It Rains
|vo_03_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} When It Rains.ogg
|vo_03_01_tx         = 仕事に響くわ。
|vo_03_01_rm         = Shigoto ni hibiku wa.
|vo_03_01_tl         = This will affect my work.
|vo_03_02_title      = 雷の日…
|vo_03_02_subtitle   = When Thunder Strikes
|vo_03_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} When Thunder Strikes.ogg
|vo_03_02_tx         = ちっ、面倒ね。
|vo_03_02_rm         = Chi', mendou ne.
|vo_03_02_tl         = Tch, what a pain.
|vo_03_03_title      = 雪の日…
|vo_03_03_subtitle   = When It Snows
|vo_03_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} When It Snows.ogg
|vo_03_03_tx         = 雪の中は、足元に気を付けなさい。
|vo_03_03_rm         = Yuki no naka wa, ashimoto ni ki wo tsukenasai.
|vo_03_03_tl         = In the snow, you should watch your step.
|vo_03_04_title      = 暴風の日…
|vo_03_04_subtitle   = When the Wind Is Blowing
|vo_03_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} When the Wind Is Blowing.ogg
|vo_03_04_tx         = 風神ブットバースの加護か？いや待って、バルバトスか…
|vo_03_04_rm         = Fuujin Buttobaasu no kago ka? Iya matte, Barubatosu ka...
|vo_03_04_tl         = Is this the blessing of the Anemo Archon Busterbutt<ref group="TN •">Rosaria's mistaken version of the name "Barbatos" comically resembles the verb {{ja|打っ飛ばす|rm=buttobasu|tl=knock down, send flying, beat up.}}</ref>? No, wait, was it Barbatos...?

|vo_04_01_title      = おはよう…
|vo_04_01_subtitle   = Good Morning
|vo_04_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Good Morning.ogg
|vo_04_01_tx         = おはよう、ふあ～もう朝のお祈りが始まってるの？勘弁してほしいわ。
|vo_04_01_rm         = Ohayou, fua~ Mou asa no o-inori ga hajimatteru no ? Kanben shite hoshii wa.
|vo_04_01_tl         = Good morning. *yawn* Have the morning prayers begun already? I wish (they'd) spare me.
|vo_04_02_title      = こんにちは…
|vo_04_02_subtitle   = Good Afternoon
|vo_04_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Good Afternoon.ogg
|vo_04_02_tx         = 午後の日光は睡眠の質を上げるの。君もためしてみたら。
|vo_04_02_rm         = Gogo no nikkou wa suimin no shitsu ga ageru no. Kimi mo tameshite mitara.
|vo_04_02_tl         = My sleep quality gets better in the afternoon sun. You should try it too.
|vo_04_03_title      = こんばんは…
|vo_04_03_subtitle   = Good Evening
|vo_04_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Good Evening.ogg
|vo_04_03_tx         = こんばんは。晩祷なら参加しないわ。理由はどうだっていいでしょ。
|vo_04_03_rm         = Konban wa. Bantou nara sanka shinai wa. Riyuu wa dou datte ii desho.
|vo_04_03_tl         = Good evening. I won't be joining the evening prayer. And it doesn't matter why.
|vo_04_04_title      = おやすみ…
|vo_04_04_subtitle   = Good Night
|vo_04_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} Good Night.ogg
|vo_04_04_tx         = もう休んでおきなさい。心配しなくても、後のことは私がやっておくから。
|vo_04_04_rm         = Mou yasunde okinasai. Shinpai shinakute mo, ato no koto wa watashi ga yatte oku kara.
|vo_04_04_tl         = Get some rest now. Don't worry, I'll handle what's left here.

|vo_05_01_title      = ロサリア自身について・仕事
|vo_05_01_subtitle   = About {character}: Sister
|vo_05_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} About {character} - Sister.ogg
|vo_05_01_tx         = 私？ただのつまらない人間よ。見ての通り、教会も仕事も好きじゃないし。
|vo_05_01_rm         = Watashi? Tada no tsumaranai ningen yo. Mite no toori, kyoukai mo shigoto mo suki ja nai shi.
|vo_05_01_tl         = Me? I'm just an uninteresting person. As you can see, I dislike both the church and work.
|vo_05_02_title      = ロサリア自身について・面倒
|vo_05_02_subtitle   = About {character}: Troubles
|vo_05_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} About {character} - Troubles.ogg
|vo_05_02_tx         = あのシスターたち本当に鬱陶しいわね。隙あらば私を捕まえてお祈りだの合唱だの…私がここにいること絶対に教えないでよ。
|vo_05_02_rm         = Ano Shisutaa-tachi hontou ni uttoushii wa ne. Suki araba watashi wo tsukamaete o-inori da no gasshou da no... Watashi ga koko ni iro koto zettai ni oshienaide yo.
|vo_05_02_tl         = Those Sisters really are troublesome. Whenever they get the chance, they stop me for prayer or choir or something... Don't you ever tell them that I'm here.

|vo_06_01_title      = 信仰について…
|vo_06_01_subtitle   = About Us: Beliefs
|vo_06_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Us - Beliefs.ogg
|vo_06_01_tx         = 神は全ての人に加護を与えることができるかもしれない。けど、絶対にそれをすることはないわ。だって、そんなことしたら人の苦難なんて笑い話になるでしょ。
|vo_06_01_rm         = Kami wa subete no hito ni kago wo ataeru koto ga dekiru ka mo shirenai. Kedo, zettai ni sore wo suru koto wa nai wa. Datte, sonna koto shitara hito no kunan nante waraibanashi ni naru desho.
|vo_06_01_tl         = Perhaps a god could bestow divine protection upon everyone, but (they) would never do that. After all, if (they) did, people's suffering would turn into a joke.
|vo_06_02_title      = 祈りについて…
|vo_06_02_subtitle   = About Us: Prayer
|vo_06_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Us - Prayer.ogg
|vo_06_02_tx         = 祈りなさい。神や他の誰かのためでなく、自分のために。
|vo_06_02_rm         = Inorinasai. Kami ya hoka no dareka no tame de naku, jibun no tame ni.
|vo_06_02_tl         = Pray. Not for the gods, nor for anyone else, but for yourself.
|vo_06_03_title      = 戦いについて…
|vo_06_03_subtitle   = About Us: Battle
|vo_06_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Us - Battle.ogg
|vo_06_03_tx         = 無理しないで、困っていることがあれば私を頼るといいわ。
|vo_06_03_rm         = Muri shinaide, komatteiru koto ga areba watashi wo tayoru to ii wa.
|vo_06_03_tl         = Don't overdo it. If you've got a problem on your hands, you can let me help.

|vo_07_01_title      = 「神の目」について…
|vo_07_01_subtitle   = About the Vision
|vo_07_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} About the Vision.ogg
|vo_07_01_tx         = 「神の目」は実力を示す証であり、生き残ったことへの勲章でもある…なんてね。本当にいいものには常に裏があるの。私には「神の目」を定義することはできない。ただお互いに、証明し合う関係なだけ。
|vo_07_01_rm         = "Kami no Me" wa jitsuryoku wo shimesu akashi de ari, ikinokotta koto he no kunshou de mo aru... nante ne. Hontou ni ii mono ni wa tsune ni ura ga aru no. Watashi ni wa "Kami no Me" wo teigi suru koto wa dekinai. Tada otagai ni, shoumei shiau kankei na dake.
|vo_07_01_tl         = A "Vision" is a proof of strength, or a medal for having survived... or not. Truly good things always have another side to them. I can't define what this "Vision" is. My relationship with it is simply one where we witness each other.
|vo_07_02_title      = シェアしたいこと…
|vo_07_02_subtitle   = Something to Share
|vo_07_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Something to Share.ogg
|vo_07_02_tx         = 私が嬉しく感じることは何かって…もし仮に、どんなに頑張ろうと解決できない問題に君がぶつかっても、この世の終わりだなんて思わないこと。だって、他の誰かが君を助けにくるかもしれないでしょ。
|vo_07_02_rm         = Watashi ga ureshiku kanjiru koto wa nani ka tte... Moshi kari ni, donna ni ganbarou to kaiketsu dekinai mondai ni kimi ga butsukatte mo, kono yo no owari da nante omowanai koto. Datte, hoka no dareka ga kimi wo tasuke ni kuru ka mo shirenai desho.
|vo_07_02_tl         = What makes me happy, you ask... That would be if, supposing that you run into a problem that you can't solve no matter how hard you try, you still don't go thinking it's the end of the world. After all, you never know whether someone may be there to help you.
|vo_07_03_title      = 興味のあること…
|vo_07_03_subtitle   = Interesting Things
|vo_07_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Interesting Things.ogg
|vo_07_03_tx         = 花にはまったく興味がないの。でも、蒲公英だけは例外。すごく美味しい蒲公英酒が造れるからね。休憩時間に一杯飲めば、朝の二度寝より気持ちいいわ。
|vo_07_03_rm         = Hana ni wa mattaku kyoumi ga nai no. Demo, tanpopo dake wa reigai. Sugoku oishii Dandiraion-shu ga tsukureru kara ne. Kyuukei jikan ni ippai nomeba, asa no nidone yori kimochi ii wa.
|vo_07_03_tl         = I'm not interested in flowers at all, but dandelions are an exception. That's because they can be made into such delicious Dandelion Wine. Drinking a glass of it during break time feels even better than going back to sleep in the morning.

|vo_08_01_title      = ディルックについて…
|vo_08_01_subtitle   = About [[Diluc]]
|vo_08_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Diluc.ogg
|vo_08_01_tx         = 一目で分かるでしょ？あのお金持ちの坊ちゃんはただ者じゃないって。慎み深い上に、自信にも満ち溢れている…それと少し、危険な香りもね。
|vo_08_01_rm         = Hitome de wakaru desho? Ano o-kanemochi no bocchan wa tadamono ja nai tte. Tsutsushimi-bukai ue ni, jishin ni mo michiafureteiru... sore to sukoshi, kiken na kaori mo ne.
|vo_08_01_tl         = Can't you tell with just a glance? That wealthy young master is no ordinary person. Not only is he discreet, but he's also full of confidence... and there's even a slight scent of danger about him.
|vo_08_02_title      = ガイアについて…
|vo_08_02_subtitle   = About [[Kaeya]]
|vo_08_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Kaeya.ogg
|vo_08_02_tx         = 人は酒に酔った時、本性を現すもの。ガイアの口がよく回るのは、その本性を隠すためよ。ふふっ、分かりやすいカモフラージュね。彼が酔っぱらった姿を君にも見せてあげたいわ。
|vo_08_02_rm         = Hito wa sake ni yotta toki, honshou wo arawasu mono. Gaia no kuchi ga yoku mawaru no wa, sono honshou wo kakusu tame yo. Fufu', wakariyasui kamofuraaju ne. Kare ga yopparatta sugata wo kimi ni misete agetai wa.
|vo_08_02_tl         = When people get drunk, they reveal their true nature. Kaeya talks smoothly so he can hide that true nature. Heh, what an obvious camouflage. I'd love to show you what he looks like when he's drunk.
|vo_08_03_title      = ウェンティについて…
|vo_08_03_subtitle   = About [[Venti]]
|vo_08_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Venti.ogg
|vo_08_03_tx         = あの吟遊詩人からはとても特別な気配がするわ…それが何なのかはまだ分からないけど、他の一般市民とは明確に違うってことだけは確かね。
|vo_08_03_rm         = Ano gin'yuu shijin kara wa totemo tokubetsu na kehai ga suru wa... Sore ga nan na no ka wa mada wakaranai kedo, hoka no ippan shimin to wa meikaku ni chigau tte koto dake wa tashika ne.
|vo_08_03_tl         = That bard gives off a very unusual feeling... I still don't know what it is, but it's obvious that he's clearly different from ordinary citizens.
|vo_08_04_title      = バーバラについて…
|vo_08_04_subtitle   = About [[Barbara]]
|vo_08_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Barbara.ogg
|vo_08_04_tx         = バーバラはいつも私に張り付いて、やれ礼拝だのやれ合唱だの言ってくるわ。もしかして、私がちゃんと仕事をしているか見張るために、ヴィクトリアが寄越した監視役じゃないわよね？
|vo_08_04_rm         = Baabara wa itsumo watashi ni haritsuite, yare reihai da no yare gasshou da no itte kuru wa. Moshi ka shite, watashi ga chanto shigoto wo shiteiru ka miharu tame ni, Vikutoria ga yokoshita kanshi-yaku ja nai wa yo ne?
|vo_08_04_tl         = Barbara is always sticking to me, saying stuff like 'oh, it's (about) worship' or 'oh, it's (about) choir.' Could she have been sent by Victoria to monitor whether I'm doing my work properly?
|vo_08_05_title      = ジンについて…
|vo_08_05_subtitle   = About [[Jean]]
|vo_08_05_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Jean.ogg
|vo_08_05_tx         = 自分の本職だけでなく、他人の後始末までする。称賛に値する女性ね。
|vo_08_05_rm         = Jibun no honshoku dake de naku, tanin no atoshimatsu made suru. Shousan ni atai-suru josei ne.
|vo_08_05_tl         = Not only does she do her own work, but she also settles matters for others. A woman worth admiring.
|vo_08_06_title      = アルベドについて…
|vo_08_06_subtitle   = About [[Albedo]]
|vo_08_06_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Albedo.ogg
|vo_08_06_tx         = 彼は、古びた屋敷に飾られた絵画のように…重みがあって、神秘的で、一目じゃ見透かすことのできない人物よ。人生経験が豊富な人は嫌いじゃないわ。
|vo_08_06_rm         = Kare wa, furubita yashiki ni kazarareta kaiga no you ni... omomi ga atte, shinpiteki de, hitome ja misukasu koto no dekinai jinbutsu yo. Jinsei keiken ga houfu na hito wa kirai ja nai wa.
|vo_08_06_tl         = He's like a painting on display in an old mansion... dignified, mysterious, and someone you can't see through at first glance. I don't dislike people with a wealth of life experience.
|vo_08_07_title      = リサについて…
|vo_08_07_subtitle   = About [[Lisa]]
|vo_08_07_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Lisa.ogg
|vo_08_07_tx         = 仕事をさぼる人は好きじゃないけど、定時で帰りたい気持ちは、とても分かるわ。
|vo_08_07_rm         = Shigoto wo saboru hito wa suki ja nai kedo, teiji de kaeritai kimochi wa, totemo wakaru wa.
|vo_08_07_tl         = I don't like people who slack off at work, but when it comes to wanting to leave on time, I understand the feeling completely.
|vo_08_08_title      = クレーについて…
|vo_08_08_subtitle   = About [[Klee]]
|vo_08_08_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Klee.ogg
|vo_08_08_tx         = 面倒くさい、とにかく面倒くさい。まあ、可愛い意味でね。
|vo_08_08_rm         = Mendokusai, tonikaku mendokusai. Maa, kawaii imi de ne.
|vo_08_08_tl         = Troublesome &mdash; just troublesome. Well, it is in a cute way.
|vo_08_09_title      = ファルカについて…
|vo_08_09_subtitle   = About [[Varka]]
|vo_08_09_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Varka.ogg
|vo_08_09_tx         = ファルカは他人の世話を焼いてばっかの、ジジ臭くて面倒な人よ。悪気はないんだろうけど。周りの人を気にかけるのが好きなのよ、あいつ。
|vo_08_09_rm         = Faruka wa tanin no sewa wo yaite bakka no, jiji-kusakute mendou na hito you. Warugi wa nai ndarou kedo. Mawari no hito wo ki ni kakeru no ga suki na no yo, aitsu.
|vo_08_09_tl         = Varka's always poking his nose into other people's business, like a bothersome old man. I'm sure he has no ill intentions, though. He really likes worrying about those around him, that fellow.
|vo_08_10_title      = 父について…
|vo_08_10_subtitle   = About Her Father
|vo_08_10_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Her Father.ogg
|vo_08_10_tx         = 父親？私には縁遠い言葉ね。私にとってはないに等しいもの、もしくはたくさんあるものとも言える。どう？おどろいたかしら？
|vo_08_10_rm         = Chichioya? Watashi ni wa endooi kotoba ne. Watashi ni totte wa nai ni hitoshii mono, moshiku wa takusan aru mono to mo ieru. Dou? Odoroita ka shira?
|vo_08_10_tl         = Father? That word is far from my mind. I could say that I may as well have none, or perhaps that I have many. How's that? Are you surprised?

|vo_09_01_title      = ロサリアを知る・1
|vo_09_01_subtitle   = More About {character}: I
|vo_09_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 01.ogg
|vo_09_01_tx         = あいさつはいらないわ。私がここに来たのは仕事を全うするため、君にできないことは私がやるわ。
|vo_09_01_rm         = Aisatsu wa iranai wa. Watashi ga koko ni kita no wa shigoto wo mattou suru tame, kimi ni dekinai koto wa watashi ga yaru wa.
|vo_09_01_tl         = No need for proper greetings. I came here to finish a job, and I'll handle what you can't.
|vo_09_02_title      = ロサリアを知る・2
|vo_09_02_subtitle   = More About {character}: II
|vo_09_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 02.ogg
|vo_09_02_tx         = 神を信仰しないシスターは何も珍しいものじゃないわ、肉が好きじゃない狩人もいるし、魚が嫌いな漁師だっている。何かをするのに好きになる必要はないの。かといって、嫌いなものから離れる必要もない。仕事ってそういうものよ。
|vo_09_02_rm         = Kami wo shinkou shinai Shisutaa wa nani mo mezurashii mono ja nai wa. Niku ga suki ja nai karyuudo mo iru shi, sakana ga kirai na ryoushi datte iru. Nanika wo suru no ni suki ni naru hitsuyou wa nai no. Ka to itte, kirai na mono kara hanareru hitsuyou mo nai. Shigoto tte sou iu mono yo.
|vo_09_02_tl         = There's nothing unusual about a Sister with no faith in the gods. There are hunters who don't like meat, and fishermen who hate fish, too. You don't have to like something in order to do it. Having said that, you also don't need to avoid something you dislike. That's just how work is.
|vo_09_03_title      = ロサリアを知る・3
|vo_09_03_subtitle   = More About {character}: III
|vo_09_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 03.ogg
|vo_09_03_tx         = 一杯どう？今年の蒲公英酒は格段に美味しいわよ。
|vo_09_03_rm         = Ippai dou? Kotoshi no Dandiraion-shu wa kakudan ni oishii wa yo.
|vo_09_03_tl         = Would you like a glass? This year's Dandelion Wine tastes exceptionally good.
|vo_09_04_title      = ロサリアを知る・4
|vo_09_04_subtitle   = More About {character}: IV
|vo_09_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 04.ogg
|vo_09_04_tx         = モンドは、人々の介護が必要なほど老いぼれているのに、独立して生存もできないほど若くて未熟。そんな矛盾を持った真っ白な獣よ。こんな場所だからこそ、私みたいな人が必要とされるの。他のシスターたちが人々を手伝うように、私もモンドを手伝っている。モンドが自由に向かって突き進んでいけるためにね。なんで白なのかって？…黒っていうのは…私みたいな人を言うからよ。
|vo_09_04_rm         = Mondo wa, hitobito no kaigo ga hitsuyou na hodo oiboreteiru no ni, dokuritsu shite seizon mo dekinai hodo wakakute mijuku. Sonna mujun wo motta masshiro na kemono yo. Konna basho da kara koso, watashi mitai na hito ga hitsuyou to sareru no. Hoka no Shisutaa-tachi ga hitobito wo tetsudau you ni, watashi mo Mondo wo tetsudatteiru. Mondo ga jiyuu ni mukatte tsukisusunde ikeru tame ni ne. Nande shiro na no ka tte? ...Kuro tte iu no wa... watashi mitai na hito wo iu kara yo.
|vo_09_04_tl         = Mondstadt is so senile that it requires people's protection, yet so young and immature that it cannot survive on its own. It's a pure white beast that's contradictory in that way. And it's precisely because it's such a place that people like me are needed. Just as the other Sisters help people, I'm helping Mondstadt as well &mdash; so that Mondstadt can push forward on the way to freedom. Why is it white, you ask? ...Because black would mean... someone like me.
|vo_09_05_title      = ロサリアを知る・5
|vo_09_05_subtitle   = More About {character}: V
|vo_09_05_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 05.ogg
|vo_09_05_tx         = 様々な過去の自分が今の自分の隣にいて、すがる思いで何かを託してくる、たまにそんなことを感じるの。きっと君も経験があるでしょ。だから、これから君が違う道を歩んでも、昔の自分を否定しないで。昔の君は、今の君の礎。過去に怯えず、向き合うことを恐れないでね。
|vo_09_05_rm         = Samazama na kako no jibun ga ima no jibun no tonari ni ite, sugaru omoi de nanika wo takushite kuru, tama ni sonna koto wo kanjiru no. Kitto kimi mo keiken ga aru desho. Dakara, kore kara kimi ga chigau michi wo ayunde mo, mukashi no jibun wo hitei shinaide. Mukashi no kimi wa, ima no kimi no ishizue. Kako ni obiezu, mukiau koto wo osorenaide ne.
|vo_09_05_tl         = Sometimes I feel as though all my past selves are beside me now, urging me to do something. I'm sure you've had that experience too. So, even if you walk a different path from now on, don't deny your former self from long ago. Your former self is the foundation of your current self. Don't fear the past, and don't be afraid of confronting it.

|vo_10_01_title      = ロサリアの趣味…
|vo_10_01_subtitle   = {character}'s Hobbies
|vo_10_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Hobbies.ogg
|vo_10_01_tx         = 一杯飲めば、嫌なことも消えてなくなるわ。とはいっても、酔ったことないけど。
|vo_10_01_rm         = Ippai nomeba, iya na koto mo kiete nakunaru wa. To wa itte mo, yotta koto nai kedo.
|vo_10_01_tl         = With one drink, (my) troubles will fade away. That said, I've never gotten drunk.
|vo_10_02_title      = ロサリアの悩み…
|vo_10_02_subtitle   = {character}'s Troubles
|vo_10_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Troubles.ogg
|vo_10_02_tx         = はぁ…来月の合唱コンクール、参加したくなかったのにヴィクトリアに名指しで指名されたわ…
|vo_10_02_rm         = Haa... Raigetsu no gasshou konkuuru, sanka shitakunakatta no ni Vikutoria ni nazashi de shimei sareta wa...
|vo_10_02_tl         = Ugh... I didn't want to join next month's choir concert, but Victoria called me out by name...
|vo_10_03_title      = 好きな食べ物…
|vo_10_03_subtitle   = Favorite Food
|vo_10_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Favorite Food.ogg
|vo_10_03_tx         = 獣肉のワイン煮込みは食べたことある？お酒と大きなお肉を一つの皿でいただけるの、最高の一品よ。
|vo_10_03_rm         = Kemononiku no Wain Nikomi wa tabeta koto aru? O-sake to ookina o-niku wo hitotsu no sara de itadakeru no, saikou no ippin yo.
|vo_10_03_tl         = Have you tried Meat Stewed in Wine<ref group="TN •">This is equivalent to "Beef Bourguignon" in the English Voice-Overs, and follows a similar naming convention to other dishes such as [[Sticky Honey Roast#Other Languages|Sticky Honey Roast]] in Japanese. As of Version 2.7, there is no in-game recipe for it.</ref>? You can enjoy alcohol and a big piece of meat on one plate &mdash; it's the finest of dishes.
|vo_10_04_title      = 嫌いな食べ物…
|vo_10_04_subtitle   = Least Favorite Food
|vo_10_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} Least Favorite Food.ogg
|vo_10_04_tx         = ハ…ハッシュドポテトにジャム？信じられない！
|vo_10_04_rm         = Ha... Hasshudo Poteto ni Jamu? Shinjirarenai!
|vo_10_04_tl         = Ha... [[Mondstadt Hash Brown#Other Languages|Hashed Potatoes]] with [[Jam]]? Unbelievable!

<!-- Receiving a Gift -->
|vo_11_01_title      = 贈り物を受け取る·1
|vo_11_01_subtitle   = Receiving a Gift: I
|vo_11_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Receiving a Gift - 01.ogg
|vo_11_01_tx         = どうやら、私たちって好みが合うみたいね。
|vo_11_01_rm         = Douyara, watashitachi tte konomi ga au mitai ne.
|vo_11_01_tl         = It seems that our tastes match.

|vo_11_02_title      = 贈り物を受け取る·2
|vo_11_02_subtitle   = Receiving a Gift: II
|vo_11_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Receiving a Gift - 02.ogg
|vo_11_02_tx         = 少なくとも、お腹は満たせるわね。
|vo_11_02_rm         = Sukunaku to mo, onaka wa mitaseru wa ne.
|vo_11_02_tl         = It'll at least fill my stomach.

|vo_11_03_title      = 贈り物を受け取る·3
|vo_11_03_subtitle   = Receiving a Gift: III
|vo_11_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Receiving a Gift - 03.ogg
|vo_11_03_tx         = 君、こういう食べ物に興味があるの？
|vo_11_03_rm         = Kimi, kou iu tabemono ni kyoumi ga aru no?
|vo_11_03_tl         = Are you interested in this kind of food?

|vo_12_01_title      = 誕生日…
|vo_12_01_subtitle   = Birthday
|vo_12_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Birthday.ogg
|vo_12_01_tx         = 今日は君の誕生日ね、何か片付けてほしい人や用事はある？手伝ってあげてもいいわ、もちろん内緒でね。
|vo_12_01_rm         = Kyou wa kimi no tanjoubi ne, nani ka katadzukete hoshii hito ya youji ga aru? Tetsudatte agete mo ii wa, mochiron naisho de ne.
|vo_12_01_tl         = Today is your birthday. Is there anyone or any business that you'd like dealt with? I can help you out, in secret, of course.

|vo_13_01_title      = 突破した感想・起
|vo_13_01_subtitle   = Feelings About Ascension: Intro
|vo_13_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Feelings About Ascension -  01.ogg
|vo_13_01_tx         = うん、いい感じね。
|vo_13_01_rm         = Un, ii kanji ne.
|vo_13_01_tl         = Hmm, feels good.
|vo_13_02_title      = 突破した感想・承
|vo_13_02_subtitle   = Feelings About Ascension: Building Up
|vo_13_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Feelings About Ascension -  02.ogg
|vo_13_02_tx         = 何か手伝ってほしいことはある？今ちょうど手が空いてるの。
|vo_13_02_rm         = Nani ka tetsudatte hoshii koto wa aru? Ima choudo te ga aiteru no.
|vo_13_02_tl         = Is there anything you need help with? I happen to be free right now.
|vo_13_03_title      = 突破した感想・転
|vo_13_03_subtitle   = Feelings About Ascension: Climax
|vo_13_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Feelings About Ascension -  03.ogg
|vo_13_03_tx         = 能力が高くなれば、仕事の効率も上がるわね。
|vo_13_03_rm         = Nouryoku ga takaku nareba, shigoto no kouritsu mo agaru wa ne.
|vo_13_03_tl         = As (my) ability improves, (my) work gets more efficient.
|vo_13_04_title      = 突破した感想・結
|vo_13_04_subtitle   = Feelings About Ascension: Conclusion
|vo_13_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} Feelings About Ascension -  04.ogg
|vo_13_04_tx         = 戦闘と殺戮に長けている私でも、これほどの力を持ったことはないわね…祝福してくれてありがとう。
|vo_13_04_rm         = Sentou to satsuriku ni taketeiru watashi demo, kore hodo no chikara wo motta koto wa nai wa ne... Shukufuku shite kurete arigatou.
|vo_13_04_tl         = Even though I'm well versed in battle and slaughter, I've never possessed such power before... Thank you for your blessing.
}}
